CREATE TABLE if not exists instruments ( id integer generated by default as identity NOT NULL, figi text unique NOT NULL, isin text NOT NULL, ticker text NOT NULL, class_code text NOT NULL, instrument_type text, api_trade_flag text, instrument_status text, lot integer, currency text, otc_flag text, exchange text, PRIMARY KEY (id) );
ALTER TABLE instruments OWNER TO postgres;
